thread.title: Inter Allies chief Senaya backs Herbert Addo to guide side to top-four finish next season
thread.title_full: Inter Allies chief Senaya backs Herbert Addo to guide side to top-four finish next season

title: Inter Allies chief Senaya backs Herbert Addo to guide side to top-four finish next season
text:
Sports News | 21 October 2015 12:10 CET Inter Allies chief Senaya backs Herbert Addo to guide side to top-four finish next season 
Inter Allies chief Delali Senaya has backed new coach Herbert Mensah to guide the side to a top-four finish. 
The experienced trainer returned to the Tema-based side on a two-year deal on Tuesday. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
